description: Shion is the main protagonist of the story. When she was five years old, Shion`s parents were slaughtered in their own home, though the murderer was never found. Shion, being a young girl at the time, was traumatised by bearing witness to the aftermath and since then has not spoken one word. To communicate, she writes down everything via notes. At the murder scene, Shion found a king shougi piece and later comes to suspect that the culprit plays the game.
name: Yasuoka Shion
